description: Try our easy to follow Wholemeal Penne With Chargrilled Vegetables & Salsa Verde recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Leftover vegetable,Asparagus,Peanut free
name: Wholemeal Penne With Chargrilled Vegetables & Salsa Verde Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small red capsicum, deseeded, cut into 1cm strips
250g large cup mushrooms, trimmed, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: For the salsa verde, process all ingredients in a food processor until well combined and smooth. Season to taste.

Toss zucchini, eggplant, capsicum, mushrooms and asparagus in a little oil to coat lightly. Heat a chargrill or barbecue over medium heat and cook vegetables for 12 minutes each side or until lightly charred and tender.

Cook pasta in boiling, salted water following packet instructions. Drain and reserve 2 tbs of the cooking liquid. Stir cooking water through salsa verde to thin a little. Toss hot pasta with vegetables, olives and salsa verde. Scatter with feta. Serve.
